title: The Earth in motion
creator_credit: Walter Bartky and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Deals with the dynamic aspects of the earth as a planet. Demonstrates: 1. Sphericity. - 2. Axis rotation established by star trails and the Foucault pendulum. - 3. Revolution around the sun by the motion of the sun in respect of the stars and by the annual parallax of the stars.
